name: KillHouse - Browser 3D fps speed running game
name_original: KillHouse - Browser 3D fps speed running game
description:
Run through a killhouse, learning the layout and shooting targets, but ammo is very heavy and you should make sure not too bring too much!

CONTROLS: all of these are seeable in game but

wasd to move, lmb to shoot, shift to run

K for settings

U for ammo change

P to reset

B to switch firing mode

base pictures for textures provided by https://freestocktextures.com/ - I don't have to put this here as it is under Creative commons zero but I would recommend them - they don't demand any email or even account.
